CLYDE NORTH: Why build when you have everything turnkey and completed? Stop looking and take advantage of this modern, stylish home and enjoy luxury living within a desirable location. This two-storey built home offers a functional, family orientated floor plan with a long list of top end extras.
On entry, you are greeted with a beautifully tiled entrance hall boasting raised ceilings, study, theatre room (with built in projector and screen) downstairs powder room and internal access from the garage.
The hostess style kitchen features an island bench with stone bench tops, generous cupboards, soft close drawers and ample bench space along with quality fixtures and lighting. There is a large butlers' pantry, 900mm stainless steel appliances that include a 900mm cook top, range-hood and dishwasher. This superb space offering so much overlooks the family and dining areas where family time will be a pleasure.
Conveniently located off the family domain is the north facing Sun room / Lanai which is welcomed by a beautiful garden outlook. With stacker sliding doors on both aspects it is the perfect space for entertaining in any season bringing the outdoors inside.
